prompts: Create a large, furry Pokemon that resembles a dog and has a gentle demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon with a thick coat of fur, ideal for a cold environment.
Imagine a stout, four-legged creature with a bushy tail and wise eyes.
Generate a Pokemon that provides companionship and loyalty to trainers during adventures.
Design a Pokemon that blends well into forest habitats and has a friendly personality.
Give me a Pokemon that exudes a sense of calm and protection with its presence.
Make a Pokemon whose strong build and fluffy appearance make it look very approachable.

distinctive_features: Fluffy white fur around the face
